name: Heritage explorer
description: (Copyright in Progress) A platform for exploring and booking visits to historical sites around Maharashtra.

name: Slot Savant
description: (Project in Collaboration with Intel) which is a car parking system which verifies the entries, maintains logs, generates insights and shows realtime parking lot activity.

name: Task Hive
description: Task Hive is a robust issue-tracking software, designed to streamline project management, enhance team collaboration, and enable real-time progress tracking for projects.

name: Buzz Chat
description: A chat application which provided one-to-one and one-to-many chat options.

name: Client Connect
description: Your all-in-one customer management solution. Seamlessly store and update client data, send bulk emails effortlessly, and access conversation history at your fingertips.
